title: AI Product Specialist to fast growing company
description:
Are you "the engineering type" and enjoying discussing AI solutions with other people. Do you have a deep knowledge about AI and preferably embedded systems, then this might be the perfect role for you!
 


 Apply here!
 
  

**City :**
 Stockholm City
 



  

**Job Category :**
 IT
 



  

**Extent :**
 Full time, long term
 



  

**Start date :**
 As soon as possible
 



  

**Type of work :**
 Staffing
   




**About the role**

 Our client is a fast growing company within the AI and embedded systems industry and are part of one of the worlds largest organisations in producing semiconductors. As they are growing their business they need to hire someone that will work in their sales department adding that extra technical knowledge and engineering mindset.
 


  


 An AI Product Specialist has deep knowledge of the company’s AI-products and technologies, as well as the ability to communicate technical details to customers in an easily understandable way. The focus is to explain and promote the products and concepts, but also educating and supporting customers, which means helping them utilize the product optimally through, for example, workshops and technical training. This also requires an understanding of the customers' business processes and how your AI products can be integrated with them.
 


  


 In this role you will work alongside your colleagues that are bringing in new clients and you will provide them with education and expertise in your products. A typical day for you will probably contain one or a couple of sales meetings with clients talking about your products and how they work. Then you might move on to preparing and hosting a webinar for another client. And in all your tasks you will make use of your technical knowledge and understanding about AI.
 


  


  

**You are offered**



  

  
* **To work for a company with cutting edge technology in AI and embedded systems**
  
* **A consultant assignment with the ultimate goal to be hired directly at the company**
  

  


**Work tasks**
  
* Promote the products to clients
  
* Give clients expert guidance in how your AI products can be leveraged by them
  
* Educate clients in how your product works through webinars and workshops
  
* Do technical demonstrations of how the products work
  
* Write technical documentation, web content and marketing material
  

  


**We are looking for**
  
* A deep interest and understanding for AI solutions from prior work experience and/or education
  
* An interest in talking about AI technologies for clients and partners
  
* Fluent in English as the company language in English
  
* Education: MsC in engineering within IT and preferably AI
  


  


  

**It is meritorious if you have**



  

  
* Experience and knowledge in embedded systems
  
* Experience from working in a customer-facing role B2B
  


  

  

**Our recruitment process**
  


 This recruitment process is handled by Academic Work and it is our client’s wish that all questions regarding the position is directed to Academic Work.
 


  


 Our selection process is continuous and the advert may close before the recruitment process is completed if we have moved forward to the next phase. The process includes two tests: one personality test and one cognitive test. The tests are tools to find the right talent for the right position, to enable equality, diversity, and a fair process.
   




**Become a part of Academic Work**

 When you apply to this job, you are becoming one of many consultants at Academic Work. This means that not only will you gain fantastic benefits, but also a team of consultant managers to support you through your career with us.
 


 Read more about Academic Work
   

**Do you have questions about this job?**

 Nils Norgren or a colleague in the recruitment team will gladly answer you on sth2@academicwork.se Please specify advert-ID in your email: 15107596

title: Business analysts, IT architects and transformation managers - Business & Technology Solutions (BTS)
description:
Choosing Capgemini means choosing a company where you will be empowered to shape your career in the way you’d like, where you’ll be supported and inspired by a collaborative community of colleagues around the world, and where you’ll be able to reimagine what’s possible. Join us and help the world’s leading organizations unlock the value of technology and build a more sustainable, more inclusive world.
   

  

**Business & Technology Solutions** 
 (BTS) is a key team within Capgemini, specializing in navigating our customers through the complexities and interdependencies that characterize large-scale technology-enabled transformation programs. Our team of experienced
 **business analysts** 
 ,
 **IT architects** 
 and
 **transformation managers** 
 , support our customers in designing, planning, and conducting digital transformations. We create a bridge between business objectives and the world of IT solutions that can help to achieve them. We’re striving to understand our customers business, current and future challenges, as well as their IT environment. We then propose, design, plan and help to implement new technological solutions or changes in the current IT landscape to improve or transform relevant processes. We often define requirements for new IT projects that are later implemented by other Capgemini units or external partners.
   

  

 We are hiring SME’s in one of the following verticals:
 **Retail** 
 ,
 **Auto** 
 or
 **Swedish Public Sector** 
 . If you’d like to join or know more, just apply – if suitable profile you’ll be invited to meet the team.
   

  

 Please note that Swedish language skills are mandatory to be excellent both spoken and written.
   

  

**BTS Supports Its Clients Through**
* The right people: consultants with in-depth process and benefits management knowledge who combine that with excellent program and client management skills to enable and accelerate the delivery of value from large-scale technology-enabled transformation programs
* The right methods: a methodology that integrates all elements of the delivery of technology-enabled transformation into one holistic approach
* The right process: a series of tools and techniques that enable effective and efficient execution of a customer's technology-enabled transformation programs, thus securing both sustained change and the delivery of business benefits


**What Capgemini BTS Stands For**
* We’re ambitious for our business, our clients and our people;
* We’re all about specialism and deep expertise: work with the best, be the best;
* Innovation is at the core of what we do. It’s in our approach, our methodologies and in our commitment to professional development;
* Through innovation, we want to make our mark on technology transformation – collectively and individually;
* We believe that the best teams are diverse, where different cultures, and varied personal and professional experience come together;
* We deliver IT-enabled business transformation and change around: Organizational Change Management, Process Consulting, IT Transformation, Architecture & Technical Leadership, Program Leadership & Project Management Office (PMO).


 As a Senior consultant in Digital Transformation, you work with some of our customers within the Public sector, Retail or Auto industry. You’ll play a leading role in complex client projects at the intersection of business and IT, advising and supporting our clients in their digital transformation. You develop the digital potential of the customers and drive forward decisive innovations in order to actively shape the digital transformation in the context of Public sector, Retail or Auto -specific problems. You will develop sustainable IT solutions with us based on business requirements and equip our customers for the future.
   

  

**The responsibilities will vary from project to project, you will for example:**
* Act as Subject Matter Expert within your area of expertise and advise and support with regard to digital transformation.
* Design and implement technology solutions enabling business to take advantage of our customers current and emerging opportunities, i.e. be part of developing, implementing, and improving business processes.
* Support our sales organization in shaping and advising on new deals.
* You analyze and identify optimization and innovation potential based on current trends in the industry and map these into future-proof IT solutions.
* With your individual strengths and your professional expertise, you will work on the further development of our service portfolio.


**Your daily tasks**
* leading consulting, IT transformation and roll-out projects for our customers,
* organizing and moderating meetings and workshops with customers representatives where you will get to know their current and future challenges as well as collect and structure requirements resulting from them,
* analyzing, modeling, and identifying improvements of business processes as well as in IT systems and environments in order to propose and design changes and optimizations,
* cooperating with customers, technology experts and development teams to design new technology solutions or changes in existing IT systems and environments,
* defining requirements and creating specifications for new IT systems or changes and transformation of existing IT landscapes,
* presenting and discussing your solution ideas with diverse groups of stakeholders to win their acceptance and commitment,
* identifying opportunities for business development and new projects, as well as contributing to new offers for our clients,
* supporting and mentoring less experienced consultants and leading consulting teams.


**What You'll Bring**
* You have several years of experience, preferably from consulting in one of the following vertical: Public sector, Retail or Auto companies, e.g. as a business analyst, process manager, enterprise manager, in requirements management or in project management.
* You are characterized by your experience/interest in business development and sales, your focus on results, your strategic thinking, your high level of self-motivation and customer orientation.
* You are a strong communicator who understands the importance of fostering relationships with business and IT stakeholders, you are comfortable working in a mixed client and Capgemini agile environment – and have a good level of Swedish both spoken and written.


**What We Offer**
 We will provide you with intense professional development and as much stretch as you need to put your skills into action, learn and progress. You will have the opportunity for:
   

  

* Acceleration: The opportunity to accelerate your career through intellectual challenge, stretch and responsibility
* Collaboration: The opportunity to work as part of a high performing, supportive and friendly team that values close collaboration with customers
* Satisfaction: Swiftly add value and make a real difference to Capgemini and to our customers organizations


**About Capgemini**
 Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2023 global revenues of €22.5 billion.
   

  

 Get The Future You Want | www.capgemini.com
   

  

*Please note that all applicants must be fluent in Swedish.*
*For more information, please mail bts\_se\_recruitment@capgemini.com*

title: Graduate and Junior Strategy Analysts to Accenture Strategy & Consulting
description:
***Be yourself, make a difference.***
 There is never a typical day at Accenture, but that’s why we love it here! You now have the opportunity to build a rewarding career as a
 **Strategy Analyst** 
 at Accenture Strategy & Consulting. If you’re looking for a challenging career working with industry-leading clients, while at the same time enjoying access to training, cutting edge technology and a global network of experts, this could be the role for you.
   

  

**About Accenture And Strategy & Consulting**
 Accenture is a global professional services company combining unmatched experience and specialized skills across more than 40 industries. We offer services within Strategy & Consulting, Technology, Operations services, and Accenture Song – all powered by the world’s largest network of Advanced Technology and Intelligent Operations centers. Our 710,000 people deliver on the promise of technology and human ingenuity every day, serving clients in more than 120 countries.
   

  

 Through deep industry expertise, analytics, and insights, Strategy & Consulting empowers clients to survive and thrive in the new, the now and the unknown. To stay agile in a world dominated by change, the C-suite must keep the core business running while simultaneously identifying and investing in the new. Accenture Strategy & Consulting enables leaders to act quickly and confidently as they pivot to the future. Known for our ability to execute at speed, we help clients determine clear, actionable paths to competitive agility by bringing them new thinking on business and technology.
   

  

**About Our Functions And Industries**
 Accenture Strategy & Consulting consists of a wide range of business functions and industry groups. Our main functions for Strategy Analysts include
 *Industry Strategy, Sustainability, Mergers & Acquisitions, Growth & Corporate Strategy, Supply Chain & Operations, CFO & Enterprise Value, and Technology Strategy & Advisory* 
 . Read more about our business functions and industries here.
   

  

**Strategy’s role within Strategy & Consulting**
 As a Strategy Analyst, you will join Accenture’s strategy segment, which key focus is to support clients all over the world determine their next winning strategy. Our projects vary from due diligences, target screenings and go-to-market strategies, to commercial-, growth-, pricing-, technology- and sustainability-strategies.
   

  

**Work you will do as a Strategy Analyst**
- Solve complex client problems by applying quantitative and qualitative analysis techniques

- Structure and communicate solutions in a way that is easy to understand

- Work in multinational teams on client-facing projects, with tasks such as creating business cases, developing presentations to client stakeholders, and prepare and conduct workshops and interviews

- Develop knowledge of prevailing trends, financials, operational drivers and deep industry and functional expertise

- Be part of high performing teams, learning from and supporting each other develop every day

- Engage in internal Accenture initiatives of your choice, such as recruiting and community activities

**What Is In It For You**
 You will have an extensive benefits package including e.g., access to app-based fitness classes, mental health courses, and private medical insurance.
   

  

 In addition, joining our team will provide
   

  

  

- Great opportunity to develop your business acumen and professional skills

- Extensive training and access to comprehensive tools and frameworks supported by our global organization

- Mentoring and continuous evaluation to ensure your career continues to progress

- Inspiring colleagues to support you

- A lot of fun activities

**Who We Are Looking For**
 We are looking for candidates who have
   

  

  

- Master's degree with excellent academic performance / or will receive degree before October 2025

- Excellent written and oral communication skills in English – Swedish is beneficial but not required

- Excellent analytical- and problem-solving skills and the ability to quickly understand new context

- Excellent written and oral presentation skills

- Passion and drive to work in a fast-paced environment

- Entrepreneurial attitude and good interpersonal skills

- Ability to work independently and as a team member

**Office and starting date**
 We are looking for graduates to join our offices in Stockholm, Gothenburg and Malmö in late summer/early autumn 2025. Mobility and flexibility to either work physically at an office (client or Accenture), or in a virtual “home office” is expected. This requires you to both have a high degree of flexibility for travelling to our clients or working with international teams virtually.
   

  

**Interested?**
 Send your application through our application portal and attach
   

  

  

- CV

- Cover Letter

- University and High School Transcripts/grades (including GPA in a 5-grade scale)

 All files should be uploaded under "Upload Resume/CV".
 **Please note that all documents are required for a complete application. Only completed applications are reviewed.** 
 Please specify in your Cover Letter if you have an interest and/or experience in a specific business function or industry.
 **Please also indicate which office you would like to apply to and when you would like to start.**
 The screening and selection process is ongoing. If your application proceeds to the next step, you will receive an invitation to complete two analytical tests. We look forward to receiving your application!
   

  

*Equal is greater than - Accenture welcomes and encourages applications from a diverse group of backgrounds related to gender, age, ethnicity, culture, race, religion and belief, disability, nationality, sexual orientation, and gender identity. Inclusion and diversity are fundamental to our culture and core values, providing an environment where everyone brings distinct experience, talent, and culture to their work.* 
*We invite you to be part of this diversity!*

title: Solution Consultant to Accenture Song
description:
**Accenture Song** 
 — As the world’s largest, most disruptive digital agency, we drive lasting growth for clients by helping them design, build, and run meaningful business and customer experiences. We are a bold and generous team of creatives, designers, technologists, strategists and engineers working together to make possibilities a reality. Accenture Song is committed to our employees and helps you get the most out of your career by igniting your full potential!
   

  

 For the team in Copenhagen and Stockholm, Accenture Song is seeking a Solution Consultant with developer background ready to contribute to global digital marketing projects for a range of international brands. Here you will have the ability to contribute and grow quickly in a truly international environment when advising our clients throughout the implementation process and together we create a playful and warm culture that gives room to grow and thrive.
   

  

**Is this the right role for you?**
 Do you want new challenges in a forward-looking and energetic environment with focus leading marketing technologies, such as Adobe Experience Cloud or Salesforce Marketing Cloud? You will be working cross-functionally with our project managers, marketing consultant, creatives and other solution consultants to implement new tools and platforms for our clients.
   

  

**We are looking for a new colleague with the following profile:**
- Master’s or bachelor’s degree in computer science, software development or similar background

- You have experience with solutions within the Adobe Experience Cloud or similar marketing and e-commerce technologies

- Minimum 2 years of experience with Adobe Marketo or Adobe Campaign

- You have experience as a back end or full stack developer and possess excellent programming skills.

- You have experience working with data modelling and integrations and do not shy away when it comes to making architectural decisions

- Analytic mindset – you enjoy working close to clients, with the ability to keep an overview when working with data

- You enjoy finding solid solutions for complex challenges and helping clients to plot a course in the ever-changing landscape of marketing technology

- You have solid English communication skills in both writing and speaking

- You are self-motivated and an excellent team player with a strong collaborative attitude

**What is in it for you?**
- A good and inclusive working environment, where you will work with inspiring and highly motivated team of experienced developers making you grow both personally and professionally.

- You will have the ability to develop your career and build your technical and analytical skills while gaining knowledge in marketing technologies and the latest trends in marketing automation.

- Meaningful and interesting client project. Early on you will be given responsibility and therefore have an impact on delivering exciting projects.

- You will get the chance to work with big clients and have your fingerprint in the development process and in Accenture Song as an organization.

- A dedicated mentor following your career journey and a strong learning culture

- Responsibility, trust and an inclusive work environment

- The opportunity to get involved in Accenture´s volunteering, sport- and social groups

- Access to industry and capability specialists in all corners of the world with first-class international knowledge and experience

- Competitive compensation and benefits

**Investing in you**
 Choose a career at Accenture and enjoy an innovative environment where challenging and interesting work is part of daily life. Submit your application, CV, cover letter and relevant degrees online today.

title: Software Engineering Analyst - Domain test & integration
description:
**Can you engineer a brighter tomorrow?**
-----------------------------------------

  

  

It’s crystal clear: the actions we take in the next few years will significantly impact our future. At Volvo Cars, we embrace change. We’re committed to transforming the automotive industry and leading in electrification. For this, we’re seeking out more creative minds to shape that future. Don’t miss this opportunity to create your tomorrow.

  

**Who we are?**  

  

At Domain Test & Integration, we are developing test environments for new platforms and programs within Volvo cars business unit - Software & Electronic Platform (SWEP). We design rigs and provide test infrastructure for software and electronic integration. Our rigs will continuously integrate (CI) and provide feedback of the electrical system to enable high quality and robustness. We can achieve this by working with simulations and quality assure what we deliver. We are team of engineers with focus on quality, sharing information and looking for new way to daily improve our products and way of working. We are looking for an engineer to join our team with experience from building a scalable system environment with focus on quality and fast feedback.

  

  

**What you will do**  



This role is not about manual testing, nor it is about writing tests for the software itself. This role is about building test environments that run automated tests and manages its infrastructure, and about creating tools, scripts and frameworks that enable developers to write tests themselves. In this role, you will help us increase the quality and reduce the risk of releasing faulty software through automation.  

  

As a member of our team, you will have the opportunity to participate in the entire process from design of our rigs(Vector HIL) to fault tracing and maintenance. You will be a part of improving tools and processes to be able to increase our efficiency when we scale up number of rigs.

  

  

You will develop and configure simulation software for integration into an operational test environment. Create health and regression tests and connect rigs to CI toolchain, to make sure that our rigs meet our own and other stakeholders test needs.  

  

**Do you fit the profile?**  

  

You have at least Bachelor of Science in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or equivalent. We see that you have experience with scalable system development and that you are proficient in Python for automation purposes. You need to have experience working with CANoe and CAPL.

  

  

We believe you have a system thinking approach so that you can see the bigger picture of how to scale and quality assure our environment.  

  

You are skilled in communication and the ability to collaborate with different stakeholders. We see that you can work in an agile team, are proactive, creative, driven, willing to share knowledge and take responsibility to fit our team.  

  

Qualifications:


* Worked with HIL, MIL development and automated test systems (preferably Vector)
* Proficient in Python and CAPL scripting
* DevOps tools
* Experience in automotive electrical architectures and protocols

Meritorious:


* Experience of Simulation and Model-Based Design using MATLAB/ Simulink


* Experience in automotive electrical architectures and protocols


**Ready to Take the Next Step?**
--------------------------------

  

  

Please submit your application through our career page. Due to GDPR regulations, we’re unable to store or consider applications from other platforms. Make sure to submit your application in English.

  

  

We’re excited to get to know you!

  


**Volvo Cars – driving change together**
----------------------------------------

  

  

Volvo Cars’ success is the result of a collaborative, diverse and inclusive working environment. Today, we’re one of the most well-known and respected car brands, with around 43,000 employees across the globe. At Volvo Cars, your career is designed around your skills and aspirations, so you can reach your fullest potential.  

  

And it’s so exciting – we’re well on our way on our journey towards full electrification. We have five fully electric cars already on the market, and five more on the way. Our fully-electric and plug-in hybrid cars combined make up almost 50 per cent of our sales. So come and join us in shaping the future of mobility. There’s never been a more rewarding time to play your part in our inspiring and creative teams!

  


Curious about Life at Volvo Cars? Read more


Curious about our story? Read more
company_description: At Volvo Car Group, our vision is clear: "To be the world's most progressive and desired premium car brand".

title: Är du passionerad kring Kubernetes, DevOps och...
description:
**Om rollen**


Som Kubernetes/DevOps-konsult hos oss på Conscia kommer du att ingå i ett team som arbetar med att designa, implementera och automatisera container-plattformar som Kubernetes och OpenShift. Du kommer att arbeta i värdebaserade projekt där vi hjälper våra kunder att skapa flexibla, skalbara och framtidssäkrade IT-miljöer.


Vi söker dig som trivs med att arbeta nära kunder och som har erfarenhet av att bygga och hantera container-plattformar och DevOps-pipelines. Du kommer att arbeta med allt från initial design och arkitektur till implementation och drift, och bidra till automatisering av dessa miljöer.

**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:**

* Design och implementation av container-plattformar som Kubernetes och OpenShift.
* Skapande och förvaltning av DevOps-pipelines för CI/CD och automatisering.
* Stödja kunder i att optimera sina miljöer och anpassa dem efter affärsbehoven.
* Automatisera processer för effektivare hantering och deployment.
* Delta i värdebaserade projekt med ett kundfokus som driver affärsnytta.  

  

**Vem är du?**
* Vi tror att du har flera års erfarenhet av att arbeta med container-plattformar och DevOps-verktyg. Du är van att hantera komplexa IT-miljöer och drivs av att skapa moderna och skalbara lösningar. Erfarenhet av automatisering, scripting och verktyg som Ansible eller Terraform är starkt meriterande.  

Vi ser gärna att du har:  

	+ God erfarenhet av Kubernetes och/eller OpenShift.
	+ Erfarenhet av CI/CD-pipelines och DevOps-verktyg (t.ex. Jenkins, Git, Docker).
	+ Kunskap inom automatisering och verktyg som Ansible, Terraform eller liknande.
	+ Erfarenhet av molnplattformar (AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud) är meriterande.
	+ En konsultativ och lösningsorienterad inställning med fokus på affärsnytta.**Varför Conscia?**  

På Conscia sätter vi stort värde på att vara nära våra kunder och bygga långsiktiga relationer. Som en del av vårt team får du möjlighet att arbeta i en innovativ och kreativ miljö där vi sätter stort värde på samarbete och kunskapsdelning. Vi erbjuder:  

	+ Möjlighet att arbeta i framåtlutade projekt hos några av Sveriges största företag.
	+ Flexibla arbetsformer och en balans mellan arbete och fritid.
	+ Stort fokus på din kompetensutveckling och möjlighet att certifiera dig inom relevanta teknologier.
	+ En värderingsdriven kultur med fokus på kundens affärsnytta.**Ansökan**  

Vill du vara med och bygga framtidens IT-lösningar tillsammans med oss på Conscia? Tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag!

title: DevOps Infrastructure Engineer
description:
**About Us:**

At Mycronic we are on the cutting edge of software development, working with one of the most advanced products in the industry. Our collaborative team of experienced developers embraces an open mindset, working together to solve challenges and push the boundaries of what's possible. We foster innovation, encouraging development and exploring new paths to problem-solving. Join us, and you'll be part of a dynamic environment where you're challenged to enhance quality and contribute innovative solutions.  



**Role Overview:**

We are currently seeking a skilled DevOps Infrastructure Engineer to serve as an admin and power user for our suite of infrastructure tools, including but not limited to Gitlab, Artifactory, Kubernetes, Docker, WMWare, Cloud Azure, and Black Duck. As an expert in these tools, you will play a crucial role in supporting the software lifecycle, from development to deployment. This position requires programming knowledge to work with and maintain these tools, along with the ability to develop new tools and scripts for automation.  



**Key Responsibilities:**

* Administer and manage infrastructure tools such as Gitlab, Artifactory, Kubernetes, Docker, WMWare, Cloud Azure, and Black Duck.
* Support the software lifecycle from development to deployment.
* Develop and maintain scripts and tools for automation.
* Work independently and take ownership of projects.
* Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure operational efficiency.
* Test and evaluate new tools and methods for effective software development.
* Provide support for infrastructure observability.
Promote automated software testing and continuous integration.  
* 

**Qualifications:**

* Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or equivalent experience.
* Analytical mindset with strong problem-solving skills.
* Detail-oriented with a commitment to producing high-quality software solutions.
* Adaptable and open to learning new technologies and tools.
* Strong communication skills for effective collaboration with teams, developers, and stakeholders.
Enjoy sharing knowledge and supporting team members.  
* 

**Experience:**

* At least 3-10 years of relevant work experience.
* Experience working in an Agile environment.
* Administration of Linux environments in a corporate setting.
* Containerization technologies and orchestration experience.
* Strong scripting skills in Python and Bash.
* Infrastructure as code experience.
* Administration of code repository and continuous integration servers.
* Familiarity with system architectures, basic network, and storage experience.
* Familiarity with Azure Tenant administration.
Familiarity with software composition analysis and license compliance.  
* 

**Mandatory Knowledge:**

* Gitlab
* Python
* Bash
* Debian/Ubuntu Linux
* Docker
Kubernetes  
* 

**Meriting Knowledge:**

* Artifactory
* Black Duck
* VMware vSphere
* Prometheus
* Grafana
* Loki
* Ansible
Powershell  
* 

**Start Date:** ASAP


**Open positions:** 1 Team Lead and 1 developer


**Office Presence:** Mandatory at least 60% in the Täby office.  



Join us in shaping the future of software development and making remarkable things happen! If you're passionate about DevOps and possess the skills we're looking for, we'd love to hear from you.

title: Cloud DevOps Engineer
description:
Are you an experienced Cloud Infrastructure Engineer that is deeply into DevOps and wants to be at the forefront of the Telco cloud evolution?


I am Thomas Mårtensson, and I am leading the development and operations of Telia's network cloud platform. Right now, we are looking for an experienced Cloud DevOps Engineer to our NFVI-team to further increase our ability to maintain and evolve the network cloud platform.


**As a Cloud DevOps Engineer** you will continue to evolve our network cloud platform and do this by using the latest technologies in the area. You will be part of an agile team that are responsible for Lifecycle Management (LCM), Change Management, Incident Management, and automation of the infrastructure.


The team works currently according to Agile and SAFe ways-of-working and are looking to adapt SRE practices/principles going forward.


The work duties consist of but are not limited to:


* Service Assurance on the platform with on call duty
* Contributing to System LCM & development roadmaps.
* Management of SW & HW upgrade planning.
* Automate the platform operations with DevOps and SRE principles

**Who we're looking for**

We think that you have a passion for automation and are inspired by new challenges and driving for an improved tomorrow. You take the initiative and have a flexible can-do attitude, as well as self-development capability to follow the industry treads and drive change. You bring a genuine interest of mentoring and sharing knowledge with the team.


Your experience:


* Solid understanding of private cloud technologies and processes, as well virtual machines, and servers (VMware: SAN, vSPhare, vROPs, NSX).
* Troubleshooting experience of both software and hardware.
* Experienced in coordinating and planning LCM activities based on vendor recommendation.
* Experienced in utilizing Infrastructure as Code (IAAS) to automate operations (Ansible, Jenkins, OpenStack, Saltstack, Terraform, CloudFormation etc.).
* Configuration management principles and tools (Git, Gerrit, Bitbucket).
* CI/CD, testing and test case development.

**We are more than a workplace**

Join our inclusive team and collaborate with over 18,000 talented colleagues from around the globe. Recognized as a Climate Leader in the Nordics and Baltics, we're passionate about creating great products and delivering extraordinary customer experiences while always prioritizing sustainability. We believe our people are our most valuable asset, ensuring everyone feels welcome and valued. When you join us, you'll receive a comprehensive benefits package tailored to your local market, opportunities for remote work, and more. You'll also have the chance to earn an annual bonus based on your performance and Telia's results. If you want to make a real impact, this is the place where you belong.


**Ready to make better happen?**

We are looking forward to your application by 2024-11-24. If you are selected for the next stage in the process, you'll be contacted by our (Hiring Manager/Talent Acquisition Partner). Required controls will be performed.


If you want to know more about this position, please contact me at thomas.x.martensson@teliacompany.com .


**Join us and let’s make better happen – together**

title: Bidra till förändring i vår Software Transformation inom Business Support!
description:
*Vill du påverka och göra skillnad på riktigt? Här bidrar du till att skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen. Det du gör spelar roll.*


Din roll


Vi söker nu dig som är engagerad och driven som vill ta sig an en kombinerad roll där du får använda dina kunskaper inom rollerna Software Configuration Manager (SCM) och DevOps till vår Business Support på Saab Dynamics i Karlskoga.


I din roll kommer du att vara en nyckelperson i Saab Dynamics pågående "Software Transformation” där du kommer vara en viktig funktion i förbättringsarbetet i våra konfigurationshanteringsprocesser och samt i att säkerställa att vi använder de senaste verktygen och metoderna för att optimera kvalitet och effektivitet för våra produktteam.


Du kommer att arbeta nära våra mjukvaruteam för att skapa förutsättningar för att våra affärsområden effektivt och kontinuerligt kan utveckla och leverera programvara till våra kunder. I rollen kommer du också att utveckla och förbättra våra miljöer för Continuous Integration (CI) och Continuous Delivery (CD), samt underhålla och optimera våra utvecklingsmiljöer för att säkerställa en smidig och effektiv utvecklingsprocess.


Du kommer även att integrera och vidareutveckla AI-stöd för att förbättra våra arbetsflöden och processer, och genom analys och visualisering av KPI-data bidra till kontinuerlig förbättring inom organisationen. Du kommer även att utveckla och förbättra vår DevOps-verksamhet tillsammans med andra seniora DevOps-ledare. Genom att implementera nya strategier, automation bidrar du till att ta vår växande verksamhet till nästa nivå.


En viktig del av din roll blir att ansvara för att våra testramverk är både effektiva och uppdaterade. Du kommer att stödja våra programvaruteam och se till att processer följs och att kvalitetsstandarder upprätthålls. Dessutom har du ett övergripande ansvar för versionshantering, konfigurationshantering och ändringshantering av programvara samt att vara drivande i att utveckla strategier och processer inom dessa områden. Du fungerar som ett stöd för våra mjukvaruteam och ger vägledning och support kring bästa metoder och verktyg.


Din profil


Vi tror att du har en teknisk utbildningsbakgrund där du erhållit en kandidat- eller masterexamen från universitetet. Du har kunskap av datavetenskap och mjukvaruteknik och brinner för att kombinera teknik och ledarskap. Har du dessutom erfarenhet av att leda team och minst 5 års arbete inom liknande roller, får du här möjlighet att vara en nyckelspelare i vår utvecklingsresa!


I denna roll söker dig som har stark problemlösningsförmåga, är detaljorienterad och anpassningsbar i en dynamisk miljö. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper och tror att du är kommunikativ, samarbetar väl med olika team och tar ansvar för arbetsuppgifterna inom ditt ansvarsområde. Du har ett analytiskt tänkande och skapar ordning och reda för att kunna arbeta strukturerat. Vidare har du god kommunikationsförmåga och kommunicerar väl på både svenska och engelska i tal och skrift.


Befattningen kräver att du genomgår och godkänns enligt vid var tid gällande bestämmelser för säkerhetsskydd. För befattningar där Saab har krav på säkerhetsklassinplacering kan, i förekommande fall, medföra krav på visst medborgarskap.


Vad du blir en del av


Bakom våra innovationer finns alla de som har gjort det möjligt. Modiga pionjärer och kluriga tänkare. Vardagshjältar och kreativa problemlösare. De som delar djup kunskap och de som utforskar nya områden. Och alla däremellan.


Här har du chansen att påverka och bidra på ditt unika sätt. Allt från att utveckla kod och bygga imponerande försvars- och säkerhetslösningar till att ta en kaffe med en kollega. Varje bidrag räknas. Vi ger dig möjlighet att anta utmaningar och skapa smarta innovationer. I vår vänliga och tekniksmarta värld finns plats för dig att växa. Vi finns här för att tillsammans skapa trygghet för människor och samhällen.


Saab är ett ledande försvars- och säkerhetsföretag med uppdrag att hjälpa nationer att skydda sin befolkning och bidrar till trygghet för människor och samhällen. Med 23 000 talangfulla medarbetare utvecklar Saab teknik och lösningar för en säkrare och mer hållbar värld.


Saab utvecklar, tillverkar och underhåller avancerade system inom flygteknik, vapen, ledningssystem, sensorer och undervattenssystem. Saab har sitt huvudkontor i Sverige men en global verksamhet där Saab är en del av många nationers försvarsförmåga. Läs mer om oss här
 

Vänligen observera att vi arbetar med löpande urval och tjänsten kan komma att tillsättas innan sista ansökningsdatum har gått ut.
company_description: Saab serves the global market with world-leading products, services and solutions from military defense to civil security.

title: Är du passionerad kring Kubernetes, DevOps och containerbaserade plattformar?
description:
**Om rollen**


Som Kubernetes/DevOps-konsult hos oss på Conscia kommer du att ingå i ett team som arbetar med att designa, implementera och automatisera container-plattformar som Kubernetes och OpenShift. Du kommer att arbeta i värdebaserade projekt där vi hjälper våra kunder att skapa flexibla, skalbara och framtidssäkrade IT-miljöer.


Vi söker dig som trivs med att arbeta nära kunder och som har erfarenhet av att bygga och hantera container-plattformar och DevOps-pipelines. Du kommer att arbeta med allt från initial design och arkitektur till implementation och drift, och bidra till automatisering av dessa miljöer.

**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:**

* Design och implementation av container-plattformar som Kubernetes och OpenShift.
* Skapande och förvaltning av DevOps-pipelines för CI/CD och automatisering.
* Stödja kunder i att optimera sina miljöer och anpassa dem efter affärsbehoven.
* Automatisera processer för effektivare hantering och deployment.
* Delta i värdebaserade projekt med ett kundfokus som driver affärsnytta.  

  

**Vem är du?**
* Vi tror att du har flera års erfarenhet av att arbeta med container-plattformar och DevOps-verktyg. Du är van att hantera komplexa IT-miljöer och drivs av att skapa moderna och skalbara lösningar. Erfarenhet av automatisering, scripting och verktyg som Ansible eller Terraform är starkt meriterande.  

Vi ser gärna att du har:  

	+ God erfarenhet av Kubernetes och/eller OpenShift.
	+ Erfarenhet av CI/CD-pipelines och DevOps-verktyg (t.ex. Jenkins, Git, Docker).
	+ Kunskap inom automatisering och verktyg som Ansible, Terraform eller liknande.
	+ Erfarenhet av molnplattformar (AWS, Azure eller Google Cloud) är meriterande.
	+ En konsultativ och lösningsorienterad inställning med fokus på affärsnytta.**Varför Conscia?**  

På Conscia sätter vi stort värde på att vara nära våra kunder och bygga långsiktiga relationer. Som en del av vårt team får du möjlighet att arbeta i en innovativ och kreativ miljö där vi sätter stort värde på samarbete och kunskapsdelning. Vi erbjuder:  

	+ Möjlighet att arbeta i framåtlutade projekt hos några av Sveriges största företag.
	+ Flexibla arbetsformer och en balans mellan arbete och fritid.
	+ Stort fokus på din kompetensutveckling och möjlighet att certifiera dig inom relevanta teknologier.
	+ En värderingsdriven kultur med fokus på kundens affärsnytta.**Ansökan**  

Vill du vara med och bygga framtidens IT-lösningar tillsammans med oss på Conscia? Tveka inte att skicka in din ansökan redan idag!

title: BUSINESS QA & RELEASE LEAD
description:
**FÖRETAG**


Stena Recycling Group

**PLATS**


Göteborg, Sverige

**SISTA ANSÖKNINGSDATUM**


2024-11-14

**YRKESOMRÅDE**


Business



  
Do you want to help take our business to the next level and at the same time contribute to a more sustainable society? Where others might see the end, we see the beginning of something new. Join us and use your potential to form a sustainable tomorrow!



Stena Recycling is excited to announce a new position for a Business QA & Release Lead. In this role your main responsibility will be ensuring the highest possible quality in our digital business flows. You will be responsible for managing testing activities from an end-to-end business perspective. This involves comprehensive preparation, meticulous execution, thorough follow-up, and focus on continuous improvement. You will also work together with SM Group IT in the continuous evolvement of Stena Metall’s Test Framework.



In addition to focusing on quality assurance and testing activities, you will also:


* Manage release windows and cycles across different business functions and companies
* Manage release interdependencies and risks, and help resolves challenges that could impact release scope, quality, and schedules
* Manage communication to business stakeholders regarding completed and upcoming releases


The position is based at the headquarters in Gothenburg, Sweden.


**It starts with you!**



We are seeking a driven person with a minimum of 2-3 years of test management experience in end-to-end and/or UAT testing. We think that you understand broad business flows within Supply Chain, Operations, and Finance. You also have experience in ERP systems within larger organizations, including implementations. Additionally, proficiency in test automation is essential for this role.



Meritorious:


* Knowledge of MS D365, especially Finance & Operations and Customer Engagement
* Knowledge in MS Azure DevOps
* Experience with Executive Automats


**In addition, you are:**


* a team player with great communication skills, action oriented with delivery focus and a can-do attitude
* diplomatic with proven influencing and negotiation skills
* a person with high integrity
* curious by nature and courageous to question the ordinary
* interested in being part of the circular economy
* a person with knowledge of the industrial sector

  
**ANSÖKAN**
-----------


Hope we have caught your attention. Join our ride today and help us, by using your potential, to make a difference and form a sustainable tomorrow! We look forward to your application as soon as possible, selection will be running continuously. We do background check in the recrutmentprocess  

  

**Sista ansökningsdatum:**  

2024-11-14

Om du har frågor om denna specifika tjänst är du välkommen att kontakta oss. För allmän information om hur det är att arbeta för Stena Metallkoncernen, besök vår karriärsida.


**CHRISTINA JOHANSSON**
Rekryteringsspecialist

**010 445 8313**
**DATASKYDDSDEKLARATION**
-------------------------


Stena Metall AB har åtagit sig att skydda och respektera din integritet. Vi vill att du ska känna dig trygg när vi behandlar dina personuppgifter. För att säkerställa en hög skyddsnivå för de personuppgifter du delar med oss kommer vi inte att behandla de ansökningar som skickas till oss via e-post.
