* Experience with SonarQube and Github Advance is a bonus.
* Ability to translate business goals into technical solutions.
* Fluent in Swedish and English.


**What We Offer**
* Access to a strong developer community within the company to learn and grow.
* Competitive Salary, Good work-life balance along with health and life insurance.


 AVIGNA holds Service authorization for SAP S/4 HANA and SAP Business All in one.
   

  

 We have received an
 **SAP Recognized Expertise designation for SAP® S/4HANA.** 
 We have consultants serving various customers using SAP and non-SAP products. Our Consulting experience spans across Telecom, Retail, Electrical, Paper, and Social Service Industries.

title: Full Stack Developer & Startup Founder (March 2025)
job_function: Information Technology, Business Development, and Strategy/Planning
company_industry: Venture Capital and Private Equity Principals
description:
**Note: This Opportunity Does Not Offer Employment, but rather an opportunity to build your own VC-backed startup!** 




  





**Who you are:** 




 You are a highly accomplished full-stack software developer with a demonstrated ability to deliver innovative solutions. Your exceptional programming skills and experience in building complex applications position you to tackle significant challenges within the tech industry. You possess a strong problem-solving aptitude and a passion for pioneering cutting-edge technologies. Driven to make a real impact, you're eager to leverage your expertise in building disruptive tech ventures.
 



  





**About Antler** 




 Antler is the world's most active venture capital firm, providing funding from pre-seed to Series C. We invest in Founders who seek to define our tomorrow and reshape the world we live in with groundbreaking technological innovation. Every year, we handpick the strongest Founders from more than 135,000 applicants across our 27 locations on the globe, which has led us to work with more than 7,000 founders to date and a portfolio of more than 1,000 startups.
 



  





**The Antler Founder Residency** 




 Join a dynamic cohort of 200+ highly motivated entrepreneurs for an immersive 12-week program. Visit our website for a detailed breakdown of how we'll support your startup launch.
 


* 12-Week full-time Immersive Journey: Kicking off March, 2025, in Stockholm.
* Co-Founder Discovery: In the first 10 weeks, collaborate with fellow Founders to find your co-founder(s).
* Pitch to Invest: Present your team and business idea to the Antler Investment Committee. Secure a net cash investment of EUR 100k for 10% equity.
* Accelerate Growth: If funded, we work closely with you to make your startup a success



  





**Program Details** 



* **Start Date:** 
 March 3rd, 2025
* **Location:** 
 Onsite at our Stockholm office
* **Compensation:** 
 While participants don't receive financial compensation during the program, pre-seed investment is available to jumpstart your venture.
* **Visa Sponsorship:** 
 Due to the non-employment nature of the program, visa sponsorship is unavailable.



  





**For our March 2025 cohort, we’re looking for someone who:** 



* Having the autonomy to develop sophisticated software solutions to address real-world challenges, merging ingenuity with functionality.
* Exceptional problem-solving and analytical skills, capable of breaking down complex issues and bringing structure into business cases
* Providing leadership, whether it’s directing a development team or managing comprehensive product delivery.
* You have an idea that you believe can solve a problem you are deeply interested in. You understand that you need co-pilots who share your vision and values.



  





**Application Process** 




 Our streamlined application process takes only 2-3 weeks:
 


1. Apply through our website.
2. Participate in an introductory interview.
3. Progress to an in-depth interview with our partners.
4. Receive a potential offer.



  





**Antler Success Stories** 




 Several companies built through the Antler program have received pre-seed investment and have gone on to secure significant funding rounds. Here are just a few examples:
 


* **Wingbits:** 
 A community-driven flight data tracking platform
* **Two:** 
 A comprehensive B2B payment suite simplifying sales for online and offline businesses.
* **Evyon:** 
 A developer of eco-friendly battery energy storage systems.
* **Glint Solar:** 
 Software accelerating the identification of optimal solar installation sites.
* **PerPlant:** 
 AI-powered sensor systems creating a gateway to sustainable agriculture.

title: Analytics Engineer
description:
**About Us**
 In 2022, Instabee was founded after combining Budbee and Instabox - two leading last-mile delivery companies with three consumer-facing brands: Budbee, Instabox, and Porterbuddy. Instabee serves millions of consumers across Europe with convenient deliveries and is on track to become the leading European e-commerce enabler. Always with the consumer at heart.
   

  

 We’re fast, both in terms of parcel delivery and when it comes to growing our business. So far our journey has taken us from Sweden to the rest of Scandinavia and parts of continental Europe, but we have no plans on stopping anytime soon. As we continue to expand, the complexity of Instabee grows in parallel. With that in mind, we’re now looking for a Analytics Engineer to help on the journey ahead!
   

  

**About The Team**
 The Business Intelligence team has 2 main roles in play, Analytics Engineer and Data Analyst. We have developed a comprehensive way of working for ourselves and our stakeholders and build our solutions on the modern data stack using FiveTran, Python, DBT and Snowflake for data ingestion, storage and modeling with Tableau as our primary data visualization product.
   

  

**What You Will Be Doing**
 Within the Business Intelligence team, you will get the opportunity to shape how Instabee builds its analytical data layers which serve everyone in our organization and enable us to make better decisions. The data warehouse is a key asset that we use for multiple data processing purposes while traditional BI is one use case we deploy, we also service data science investigations and create endpoints for our technology teams to use in our products and services.
   

  

**Why an Analytics Engineer**
 The intersection of data analysis and engineering has seen the emergence of the Analytics Engineer where data ingestion is a solved problem thanks to SaaS products and easier programmatic integration patterns, and the value focus is on data modeling in SQL and building actionable data models for multiple use cases.
   

  

**As An Analytics Engineer, You Will Cover**
* Design and build data models that support business processes, where governance and trust in data are critical
* Be an expert in data transformation techniques using SQL and here at Instabee we use DBT to automate this as well as Python
* Work on analytical projects to help answer a hypothesis or solve an idea a stakeholder might have
* Demonstrate an appetite to try new approaches, staying up to date with market trends and advances in data processing
* Be comfortable promoting your work both internally and externally


*We think you are a person who...*
* Will have experience from a Data Analyst, Data Engineering or Data Scientist role
* A university degree in an analytical field (e.g. Mathematics, Computer Science, Physics)
* Has strong knowledge of SQL and command of analytical functions
* Understands data modeling techniques and their value in delivering end user self-service
* Has good programming skills (Python, Go)
* Is able to use a data visualization and methodical approach to communicate your analytical findings
* Understands the value of modern cloud computing and SaaS tools we have in play at Instabee (FiveTran, Snowflake, DBT, Tableau, Python)


**What We Offer**
 The chance to be part of something truly amazing and revolutionizing the logistics industry with new product offerings and exemplary service is what excites every employee working here today and we are still just getting started!
   

  

 If you’ve read this far there is clearly nothing stopping you from clicking the apply button.
   

  

 We look forward to meeting you.
   

  

**Benefits**
 Of course, we have all the necessary and standard benefits in place, but in addition to this, we can also offer:
   

  

 🌇 Sky-High Office: Modern and newly renovated with a 360-degree view around Stockholm.
   

  

 🐶 Puppy Friendly: Bring your dog to work - we've got a whole floor for our furry friends!
   

  

 🍸 Rooftop Fridays: Chill out at our Friday rooftop bar with the best views in town
   

  

 🥐 Wednesdays Tech Breakfasts: Fuel your midweek with tech talks and tasty bites.
   

  

 👾 Tech Demos: Dive into the latest innovations with our regular tech showcases.
   

  

 💻 Modern Tech Stack: Work with cutting-edge technology every day.
   

  

 🏓 Fun Games: Ping pong, Shuffleboard, Foosball, and even a Karaoke Room for your leisure time.
   

  

 ⏰ Flexible Hours: Hybrid setup with working hours that adapt to your lifestyle.
   

  

 👶 Parental Pay for Six Months: Step away from work and provide the best care
   

  

 and love to your little one.
   

  

 🎂 A Day Off on Your Birthday: We love to celebrate, so enjoy your birthday to the fullest with a day off each year!
   

  

 Diversity and inclusion is very important to us and we are committed to creating an inclusive work environment. We want to be a workplace where everyone’s perspectives and opinions are valued, and we are dedicated to creating opportunities for all employees to thrive and reach their full potential.
   

  

*This recruitment process consists of background checks via Verifiera as a review of previous public criminal records. The result is public information that is handled confidentially. This is mandatory for all recruitment processes at Instabee (Instabox/Budbee) in Sweden.*

title: Business Developer - Stockholm
description:
Be a part of the next big thing
   

  

 Do you thrive on tackling complex challenges? Are you passionate about creating impactful solutions that drive commerce forward? Are you someone who believes in encouraging and elevating those around you?
   

  

**About Us**
 Kustom, formerly known as Klarna Checkout (KCO), is the Nordic market leader in digital checkout solutions. Today, we support over 24,000 merchants across more than 170 countries, providing a streamlined checkout experience. We offer localized solutions in 18 markets, tailored to specific languages, currencies, and payment methods. No matter where your business operates, we deliver a checkout experience that meets the needs of both merchants and shoppers—driving growth globally. 🌍
   

  

 The role
   

  

 As Business Developer at Kustom, you'll be at the forefront of our ambitious expansion plans, focusing on high-value strategic accounts that are crucial to our continued growth and long-term success. This role is perfect for a dynamic professional who thrives on building and nurturing relationships with major accounts while driving strategic growth initiatives.
   

  

 In this pivotal position, you'll work directly with our executive team, playing a key role in shaping and executing our growth strategy. You'll be responsible for identifying, pursuing, and securing partnerships with enterprise-level clients, leveraging your expertise to position Kustom as the go-to solution for seamless commerce experiences.
   

  

 Your ability to understand complex business needs, articulate our value proposition, and navigate intricate decision-making processes will be essential. You'll be the driving force behind significant deals that not only contribute to our bottom line but also enhance our market position and industry influence.
   

  

 Things you'll be doing
   

  

* Manage and nurture relationships with key enterprise accounts
* Develop and implement strategies to grow our portfolio of major clients
* Present Kustom Checkout's advanced payment solutions to high-value prospects
* Conduct market analysis to identify trends and opportunities for client expansion
* Work closely with cross-functional teams to ensure premium client experience and retention
* Execute churn prevention measures, including strategic deal re-negotiations
* Identify and manage expansion opportunities within existing accounts
* Drive new sales and increase market share through competitive strategies


**Skills And Experience You'll Need**
* Minimum of 4 years experience in enterprise sales with a proven track, preferably in the payments industry
* Deep understanding of payment methods and commercial models in fintech
* Exceptional communication skills with the ability to build relationships quickly
* Tech-savvy individual passionate about innovative payment solutions
* Experience of working in a fast-paced, dynamic environment
* Fluency in Swedish, along with excellent English communication skills


 We believe you'll thrive in this role if you have
   

  

* Strong analytical skills to interpret complex business metrics and drive strategic decisions
* Proactive self-starter with a proven track record of closing high-value deals
* Collaborative team player who thrives in a competitive environment
* Insatiable curiosity and commitment to continuous learning and professional development
* Exceptional adaptability to navigate diverse client needs and market dynamics


**Benefits**
* Robust pension plan with national and occupational components
* Excellent health insurance coverage, including long-term illness protection and salary exchange options
* Annual wellness allowance of 3,000 SEK to invest in your health and fitness
* Extra day off when major holidays (e.g., Christmas Eve, New Year's Eve) fall on weekends
* Continuous learning opportunities and professional development support


 A place to grow
   

  

 At Kustom, you’re not going to be just another face in the crowd. This is a place where we elevate each other and celebrate success as a team. We believe in our ability to create excellence — and have fun doing it!
   

  

 And we know we set high expectations, but we also know that the road to success isn’t a straight line. We support and encourage each other to try, to fail, to try again. Because that’s how we grow, individually and together.
   

  

 Does this sound like the place for you?
   

  

**About Your Application**
* Please apply in English. At Kustom we welcome everyone! We don’t care where you’re from, whom you love, what kind of food is your favorite (well, unless we’re having a celebration together, then we’ll have to know 😉!), if you believe in this or in that - everyone is welcome!
* Giving the above, we treat all candidates the same! That’s why we have this awesome recruitment tool to keep track of all the amazing talents that apply - so please; apply through the system and we’ll make sure to keep you updated along the recruitment process. And be noticed that we can’t keep track of all CV’s and likewise via email. 🙌
* We value your privacy! When you apply, we'll handle your data with care. Want to know more about how we use your information? Check out our FAQs at the bottom of the jobs page - we've got all the details there for you!

title: Data Engineer
company_industry: IT Services and IT Consulting and Real Estate
description:
Pigello letar nu efter en Data Engineer som kan stärka upp vårt implementationsteam. För att fortsätta vår utveckling av ett öppet, användarvänligt system med fokus på automatiserade processer letar vi nu efter en Data Engineer. Du kommer i din roll vara en del av Pigellos implementationsteam och med det vara delaktig att bygga upp interna verktyg samt förvalta dessa. Arbetsuppgifterna inkluderar därtill nära samarbete med övriga implementationsteamet, utvecklingsteamet, samt kontinuerlig kontakt med övriga medarbetare för att få en tydlig förståelse av kunders behov och problematik.
 



  





 Hos Pigello så blir ditt bidrag en mycket viktig del för den pågående expansionen och vi söker därför dig som brinner för data och förvaltning av stora mängder data. Med logik och välskriven kod som verktyg kan du bli delaktig i att driva den spännande tillväxtresan hos Pigello framåt.
 



  





**Vem är du?** 




 Vi tror att du besitter ett stort analytiskt tänk, uppskattar logiken i kod och trivs med att få ta stort eget ansvar och driva egna projekt. Du trivs i miljöer där det händer mycket och vidare så ser du positivt på möjligheten att tillsammans med ett dedikerat mindre team vara delaktig i att skala upp hela verksamheten.
 



  





**Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter och ansvar:** 



* Utveckla Pigellos interna verktyg för datahantering och konvertering
* Förvalta befintliga interna system
* Assistera övriga implementationsteam i kund importer
* Utveckla befintlig produkt med fokus på automatisering och användarvänlighet
* Ta dig an nya projekt både självständigt, samt tillsammans med övriga utvecklingsteamet
* Hålla ett nära samarbete med övriga medarbetare såsom tech-, sälj- och customer success team



  





**För att lyckas i denna roll behöver du:** 



* Tidigare erfarenhet av dataproccessering, dataanalys och hantering av stora mängder data
* 2-3 års erfarenhet av backendutveckling i javascript
* Vara analytisk, lösningsorienterad och ha ett öga för välskriven kod
* Meriterande med erfarenhet av frontend utveckling
* Meriterande med erfarenhet av utveckling i objektsorienterade språk såsom Rust, Java och/eller C
* Meriterande om du har tidigare erfarenhet kring integrationer och arbete med öppna APIer
* Mycket meriterande om du har erfarenhet av AWS eller utveckling i andra cloud-miljöer



  





**Om tjänsten** 



* Tillträde: Snarast eller enligt överenskommelse
* Arbetstid: Heltid
* Arbetsort: Stockholm
* Sista ansökningsdatum: Urval och intervjuer sker löpande



  





**Om Pigello** 




*Pigello är ett snabbväxande bolag inom programvaror till fastighetsbranschen. Bolaget grundades 2019 med syftet att tillhandahålla ett öppet och skalbart fastighetssystem och erbjuder idag ett komplett och användarvänligt systemstöd rörande processer för ekonomi, uthyrning, hyresadministration, teknisk förvaltning och dataanalys.* 




  





**Vad erbjuder vi?** 




 På Pigello erbjuder vi möjligheten att bli del av ett ungt och drivet team som värderar att ha kul tillsammans. Bli del av en företagskultur med högt i tak där vi motiverar och uppmuntrar varandra för att nå våra gemensamma mål tillsammans. Du kommer in i ett tidigt skede i en snabbt växande startup med chansen att påverka från start samt karriär- och utvecklingsmöjligheter framöver. Du blir en nyckelspelare i vårt utvecklingsteam där du kommer att vara en viktig del i produktutvecklingen framöver. Placering är på vårt kontor i centrala Stockholm men erbjuds även flexibilitet, för oss är det viktigt att du har de bästa möjliga förutsättningarna för att kunna göra ett bra jobb!
 



  





**Vill du vara en del av denna spännande resa?** 




 Känner du att just du passar in i beskrivningen ovan så är vi mycket intresserade av att komma i kontakt med dig. Ansök direkt via denna annons eller skicka ditt CV och portfolio till talent@pigello.se.

title: Senior Data Engineer
description:
**Company Description** 




 Diggibyte is a technology consulting and services company. We help organizations build innovative products and solutions using big data and analytics on the cloud and on-premises. Our team consists of experienced professionals, with backgrounds in design, software engineering, analytics, and data science, committed to helping our clients achieve their goals.

 This is a full-time on-site role as a Senior Data Engineer at Stockholm, Stockholm County, Sweden .

title: iOS Engineer
description:
Did you know that fishing is the world’s most popular hobby? We do! And here at
 **Fishbrain** 
 we have built the world's #1 fishing app dedicated to people who love fishing. We want to make sure that we can give them the greatest experience possible and make their fishing dreams come true, today and tomorrow.
   

  

**About**
 We are currently looking for an
 **iOS Engineer** 
 who loves to learn, is passionate about taking on new challenges and making the best possible product for our customers. Please submit applications in
 **ENGLISH** 
 , those that are not will not be reviewed.
 **What you’ll work on:**
 As an
 **iOS Engineer** 
 you will be a core member of the Growth product team. You will apply your technical expertise to build robust and innovative features, and in addition to contributing with your coding skills, you’re expected to contribute ideas and input into all stages of the product lifecycle.
   

  

**You Can Expect To**
* Be a core member of the product team as well as the iOS guild team. Your opinions and ideas matter when shaping a product and how a team functions.
* Contribute to all product lifecycle stages: design, implementation, experimentation, testing, release, and maintenance.
* Collaborate proactively, whether through pair programming to solve complex technical issues or by building features across product teams. We believe in winning as a team.
* Work on features and experiments to drive user engagement and retention, making data-driven decisions impacting growth metrics.
* Have access to the tools and resources you need to do your best work.


**What We Are Fishing For**
 In order for you to thrive in this role, we believe that you:
   

  

* Can work autonomously, and are more motivated by missions and goals than a specific list of tasks.
* Have 3+ years of professional and recent experience building native iOS apps.
* Are passionate about technology and love exploring new ideas to solve complex problems.
* Are all about building great products that users love, and you make technology choices with this in mind.
* Have robust experience building complex iOS applications using Swift, with a strong knowledge of platform-specific design patterns and best practices.
* Proficiency in the English language, both written and verbal, sufficient for success in a remote-hybrid and largely asynchronous work environment.
* This is an office-hybrid position, with flexibility to work remotely while also collaborating in-person as needed. We are in the Stockholm office two days per week minimum.


**Nice To Have**
* Experience working with A/B tests.
* Experience working with Amplitude, Firebase, Braze.
* Experience working in a product company.


**Our Bait**
 We’re a product-focused startup, and every individual is important. That means you get to contribute to the direction of the company and the impact we have on millions of anglers. We at Fishbrain work with the latest tech and challenge ourselves every day. We have a work culture that encourages innovation, passion and teamwork. And most importantly, we want you to enjoy coming to work every single day.
   

  

**In Addition, Fishbrain Also Offers**
**🌴 30 days annual vacation** 
 Each year you’ll get 30 days vacation to use however, whenever
   

  

**🤸‍♀️ Wellness bonus** 
 5000 sek annual allowance to put towards anything in the realm of health and fitness
   

  

**💻📱 Technology of your choice** 
 Mac or Linux, you decide
   

  

**🎣 Fishing rods in the offices** 
 Grab one and go fishing during lunch. We have fishing guides and experts working among us that can help you catch your dream fish
   

  

**🐕 Dog friendly** 
 Feel free to bring your furry friend to the office
   

  

**🌎 Commitment to sustainability** 
 Fishbrain's global data set, among the largest in the world, is selectively provided in a managed and controlled manner to scientific research partners in both North America and Europe to better understand and improve fisheries research
   

  

**Feeling hooked? Throw us a line!**

title: SDE II - iOS Software Developer, Sye
description:
***This job is with Amazon, an inclusive employer and a member of myGwork – the largest global platform for the LGBTQ+ business community. Please do not contact the recruiter directly.***
**Description**
 Come build the future of entertainment with us. Are you interested in shaping the future of movies and television? Do you want to define the next generation of how and what Amazon customers are watching?
   

  

 Prime Video is a premium streaming service that offers customers a vast collection of TV shows and movies - all with the ease of finding what they love to watch in one place. We offer customers thousands of popular movies and TV shows including Amazon Originals and exclusive licensed content to exciting live sports events. We also offer our members the opportunity to subscribe to add-on channels which they can cancel at anytime and to rent or buy new release movies and TV box sets on the Prime Video Store. Prime Video is a fast-paced, growth business - available in over 240 countries and territories worldwide. The team works in a dynamic environment where innovating on behalf of our customers is at the heart of everything we do. If this sounds exciting to you, please read on.
   

  

 In this role, you will be joining the live low latency streaming team as an iOS specialised developer. We deliver Sye, a revolutionary streaming platform primarily used for live sporting events and concerts. Our ambition is to drastically improve the customer experience of watching live streams by providing minimal latency and synchronized playback to all viewers across the globe.
   

  

 Key job responsibilities
   

  

 As an iOS developer on our live low latency streaming player team, you will innovate on and improve the components providing live streaming capabilities to end user applications. The platforms that the team supports include Android, iOS, web, smart-TVs, set-top-boxes and game consoles, where you will focus on iOS.
   

  

 Your will work on the SDKs we provide as well as their integration into Prime Video applications that are used by millions of customers around the world. Your work will also include developing reference and demo implementations, setting up automated tests for different hardware and software platforms.
   

  

 A day in the life
   

  

 As part of the Sye team you will be involved with daily stand-ups, coding, code reviews for team members, internal and cross team meetings to align on technical complexities, estimate deliveries with milestones and write technical documents. Large events involves planning of new features to be deployed, tests to be performed and data to be analyzed in order to continuously improve the customer experience. Status and goals tracking are expected every so often.
   

  

**About The Team**
 The team owns the live low latency player SDKs for supported platforms, and we also work on the integration of them into Prime Video applications.
   

  

 We are growing, and with us you will also be able to grow as we work together. There are lots of opportunities to interact with other teams globally. Together with partners such as Twitch and IMDb TV, we are part of a strong video streaming community that will be available to you.
   

  

 We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:
   

  

 Stockholm, SWE
   

  

**Basic Qualifications**
* iOS specific experience in professional, non-internship software development
* Proven experience in non-internship design or architecture (design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and existing systems experience
* Experience programming with at least one software programming language
* Experience contributing to the architecture and design (architecture, design patterns, reliability and scaling) of new and current systems
* Experience programming with at least one iOS language such as Objective C or Swift.


**Preferred Qualifications**
* Experience in full software development life cycle, including coding standards, code reviews, source control management, build processes, testing, and operations experience
* Bachelor's degree in computer science or equivalent


 Amazon is an equal opportunities employer. We believe passionately that employing a diverse workforce is central to our success. We make recruiting decisions based on your experience and skills. We value your passion to discover, invent, simplify and build. Protecting your privacy and the security of your data is a longstanding top priority for Amazon. Please consult our Privacy Notice (https://www.amazon.jobs/en/privacy\_page) to know more about how we collect, use and transfer the personal data of our candidates.
